actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage and the target makes a DC 9 Constitution saving throw  taking 2 (1d4) poison damage on a failure.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: The spider can climb even on difficult surfaces and upside down on ceilings.

special_abilities.name: Web Sense
special_abilities.desc: While touching a web, the spider knows the location of other creatures touching that web.

special_abilities.name: Web Walker
special_abilities.desc: The spider ignores movement restrictions imposed by webs.
